amendatorysection.para: Any employee or officer of the State of Nebraska who operates or has under his or her control any state-owned vehicle, any other motor vehicle acquired by the State of Nebraska, or any unit of road machinery which is not numbered, lettered, or marked as required by section 81-1021, or who violates any of the other provisions of sections 60-3,105, 60-3,106, 81-1021, and 81-1022 shall be deemed guilty of official misconduct in office for a palpable omission of duty and upon conviction thereof shall be guilty of a Class II misdemeanor. The court shall have the power to add to the judgment that any officer so convicted shall be removed from office or employment.
